glsa.title: Jinja2: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Jinja2, allowing local attackers to escalate their privileges.

background.p: Jinja2 is a template engine written in pure Python.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Jinja2. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A local attacker could gain escalated privileges via a specially crafted cache file or pre-created temporary directory.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Jinja2 users should upgrade to the latest version:
